entry.title: KB31 (comes in 4 colors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Scarves
Price: 24.00

Cozy, luxurious and beautiful color gradient hand felted scarf. Soft enough to be worn next to the skin, lightweight, and long enough to be wrapped around the neck or arms easily. Accent your next outing with this bright rainbow inspired felted scarf.

Comes in 4 assortments of color

composition: 100% merino wool
care: Hand wash in warm water with mild detergent. Squeeze gently. Hang dry.
Size: 67 inch x 16 inch (170 cm x 40 cm)



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: KBS-14 (leaf vine scarf)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Scarves
Price: 22.00

Inspired by colorful saris, we use soft merino wool, blended some silk sari into it to create a stunning accent for any outfit. It is very soft and drapery, like a fine sheer fabric and each piece is a one of a kind piece of fiber art. This scarf is handmade using only soap and warm water technique. 

composition: 100% merino wool & chiffon.
care: Hand wash in warm water with mild detergent. Squeeze gently. Hang dry.
Size: 67 inch x 16 inch (170 cm x 40 cm)

 

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor setting

entry.title: KBS-18 (comes in 3 colors)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Scarves
Price: 28.00

Process of "eco-printing" or "botanical printing" with no synthetic inks, dyes or pigments. All our natural printed nuno felt scarves has been hand dyed with the pigments of real leaves. Leaves were cascaded down the scarf and bundled with string and steamed for three hours to create these warm colours. Lid of the steamer is open only after 12 hours and scarf is cleaned with sea salt water and sun dried for several hours. And the results are stunning.

Our eco print scarves are unusual and fabulous One-Of-Kind finds for any nature lovers! 

composition: Merino wool & Chiffon
care: Hand wash in warm water with mild detergent. Squeeze gently. Hang dry.
Size: 67 inch x 16 inch (170 cm x 40 cm).


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
